metadata.name: Take me to the Mountains
metadata.description:
Take me to the Mountains

After visiting the magnificent Pangong Lake, I was on my way to Nubra Valley. It was late in the evening, and the light was spectacular. The snow-capped mountain peaks glowed in the evening light. Then there was this sudden glacier stream that washed away the road. With the evening lights, water stream, and glowing snow-capped mountains in the background, the entire atmosphere was magical. I couldn't help but photograph the atmosphere. I felt as if nature was greeting me and inviting me to the mountains.

I took the photo with my phone because my camera was inside the vehicle.

Collection: Ladakh Diaries by Agni  
Edition: Open  
Dimensions: 3000x4000  
Medium: Digital Photography 
Photographer: Agni ( @agnimax )
